TopicTitle: Oh, Kerbals, yeah? I used to have a scene with them.

Articles.Content:
Hello again, forum.

I've been silent since the great forum crash of whenever-the-heck-it-was downed my old account, as that coincided with my losing enthusiasm (it was those new rover wheels wot dunnit...) for a couple of patches - anyway, now I'm back, slightly older, possibly wiser and hoping to get back into the game. So hi. Kerbin looks a lot different these days.

I'm looking to do something fresh, 'cause I'd pretty much got stuck in a rut for ship designs last time round; I got something that worked and kept repeating it forever... suggestions welcome.
